title: Roses
lyrics:
Get this out the way, babe
Tell me that you’re only human
I’ve made my mistake
Act like I know what I’m doing
And I was thinking ‘bout this, and you ruin all sips

Like it was a bad thing

And I was thinking about hits, and now we’re hitting that switch

Oh you will see becoming in the dark



Passing out there, better the roses

Lady so bad, just let her show it

(Ooh you’ve got to let it show it)

Oh you’ve got to let it show it

Once in a while, It’s just the beginning

You on my mind, as long as I’m living

(Ooh you’ve got to let it show it)

Oh you’ve got to let her know it, hey



And I could've told ya this

Something that you never ever have

I’m a lot of things

I still get my ways



Passing out there, better the roses

Lady so bad, just let her show it

(Ooh you’ve got to let it show it)

Oh you’ve got to let it show it, yeah

Once in a while, It’s just the beginning

You on my mind, as long as I’m living

(Ooh you’ve got to let it show it)

Oh you’ve got to let her know it

Hey



Hey, hey, hey



Well I wanna say, she don’t like dancing alone

Come on and say, some I don’t already know

Touching aside, hey did you got it gate

Knowing up right, when you will start this race, babe

Well I wanna say she don’t like dancing alone

Come on and say, some I don’t already know
